channel.title: Song topics?
channel.description:
Hello everyone. Most of you might not know that I sing particularly well, and my friend and I are planning on getting a CD together (he plays guitar and I play piano/guitar). I have horrible writers block at the moment and the only 2 songs we've written so far have been about love (I know, it's corny, but it's the easiest thing to write about).
So, you're asking why I'm posting this here? Well, I was hoping that you all might have some topics for songs :). What are your favorite topics? Have any good ideas? I'm sure you all have a wide imagination, so give me some ideas. Thanks!
- Cody

item.title: Song topics?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“spy man47, post:2, topic:350456”]What do you excatly mean? Tell you what songs we love?[/quote]No definitely not, as there is already a thread about that lol. I’m just asking for some ideas to sing about. Writers block sucks, and I’ve been wiped out of ideas.

Read full topic

item.title: Song topics?
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

What do you excatly mean? Tell you what songs we love?

אני לא יודע מא אתה אמר
